column1: The game ended without a goal
column2: with Morocco and Croatia unable to break the deadlock. Both teams had two shots on target each
column3: with Croatia having the better of the first-half chances. Perisic and Modric both missed the target
column4: while Vlasic forced a good save from Bounou. In the second half
column5: Mazraoui had a diving header saved
column6: and Livakovic denied Hakimi's powerful long-range effort.
